title: Riot I can't buy Camille after many attempts.
body: I played normals for a whole week trying to save IP for Camille when I thought I had enough I logged on and I couldn't purchase her even though I obviously have enough IP to purchase her.

replies.body:
Thanks for this! What happens if you try to legacy client?

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know if that helps!
It looks like your IP balance was out of sync.  Perform a relog when you get a chance, which should allow you to unlock her.  Let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4YuQxFEE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-13T22:07:10.807+0000)

> It looks like your IP balance was out of sync.  Perform a relog when you get a chance, which should allow you to unlock her.  Let me know!
